level.heading: CURRENT EDITIONS OF GREEN BUILDING STANDARDS (§ 20-3501)

level.text: The current edition of the LEED® standard is LEED® 2009.
The current edition of the Green Communities standard is Green Communities 2008.
For both newly constructed and substantially improved public schools, the District shall aspire to meet LEED for Schools certification at the Gold level or higher.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 55 DCR 11318 (October 31, 2008); as amended by the Healthy Schools Act of 2010, effective July 27, 2010 (D.C. Law 18-209), published at 57 DCR 7548 (August 20, 2010); as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 6422, 6423 (July 29, 2011).
